languages.text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 Fellowship and Intelligence.
Once the servo-skull swarm's wounds are reduced to 0, it deals {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} shock damage with 50% armour penetration to each enemy in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 Fellowship and Intelligence.
Once the servo-skull swarm's wounds are reduced to 0, it deals {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} shock damage with 50% armour penetration to each enemy in a 4-cell radius.

languages.text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
Once the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0, it deals {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to each enemy in a 4-cell radius.
languages.original_text:
Рой сервочерепов получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g}.
Когда его {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} опускается до 0, он наносит {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}электрического урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 50% каждому врагу в радиусе 4 клеток.

languages.text:
Hizmelet sürüsü, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği kazanır.
Hizmelet sürüsü, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı 0'a indiğinde 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm düşmanlara %50 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değeriyle {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}şok hasarı{/g} verir.

languages.text:
El enjambre de servocráneos recibe +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} e {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}.
Cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del enjambre de servocráneos se reducen a 0, inflige {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} de {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}daño de conmoción{/g} con un 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} a todos los enemigos que haya en un radio de 4 casillas.
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
Once the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0, it deals {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to each enemy in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
El enjambre de servocráneos recibe +10 de Empatía e Inteligencia.
Cuando las heridas del enjambre de servocráneos se reducen a 0, inflige {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} de daño de conmoción con un 50 % de penetración de armadura a todos los enemigos que haya en un radio de 4 casillas.

languages.text:
伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高10点。
当伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降为0时，它会对距离4格以内的所有敌人造成{uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e}点{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}电击伤害{/g}。此次攻击拥有50%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
Once the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0, it deals {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to each enemy in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
伺服头骨集群的社交、智力提高10点。
当伺服头骨集群的生命值降为0时，它会对距离4格以内的所有敌人造成{uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e}点电击伤害。此次攻击拥有50%护甲穿透。

languages.text:
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}.
Sobald die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Servoschädel-Schwarms auf 0 absinken, verursacht er {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g} mit 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} bei jedem Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern.
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
Once the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0, it deals {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to each enemy in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +10 Gefolgschaft und Intelligenz.
Sobald die Wunden des Servoschädel-Schwarms auf 0 absinken, verursacht er {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} Schockschaden mit 50 % Rüstungsdurchdringung bei jedem Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern.

languages.text:
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de +10.
Lorsque les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de l'essaim de servocrânes atteignent 0, il inflige {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} points de {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}dégâts d'électrocution{/g} avec 50 % à la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} à chaque ennemi situé dans un rayon de 4 cases.
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
Once the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0, it deals {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to each enemy in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de Sociabilité et d'Intelligence de +10.
Lorsque les blessures de l'essaim de servocrânes atteignent 0, il inflige {uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e} points de dégâts d'électrocution avec 50 % à la pénétration d'armure à chaque ennemi situé dans un rayon de 4 cases.

languages.text:
サーヴォスカルスウォームの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}が+10される。
サーヴォスカルスウォームの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が0に低下すると、半径4セルの敵につき50%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}で{uip|Damage|c1c33574340f43979a8ecab4c8af708e}{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}を与える。
